segments.text: I notice the girl is watching her brother carefully, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she really wants a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her hand is open, ready to receive whatever he gives her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being careful, trying not to make any noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they must really want those cookies to risk getting in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling a bit, but he's managing to stay balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cookie jar is almost full, so they have plenty to choose from.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing very still, like she's afraid of making a sound.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mom will notice the missing cookies later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to have this all planned out.
segments.speaker: PAR
